scripts.build: rimraf build tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && tsc --incremental false --outDir build
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--disable-warning=DEP0174 TS_NODE_BASEURL=./build node -r tsconfig-paths/register build/main.js
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--disable-warning=DEP0174 TS_NODE_BASEURL=./src ts-node-dev -r tsconfig-paths/register --transpile-only --respawn --rs --clear src/main.ts
scripts.repl: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS='--disable-warning=DEP0174 --experimental-repl-await' TS_NODE_BASEURL=./src ts-node --transpile-only -r tsconfig-paths/register -r scripts/repl
scripts.db:seed: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--disable-warning=DEP0174 TS_NODE_BASEURL=./src ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register --transpile-only src/scripts/seeddb.ts
